title: Family And Friends Grieve Death Of 11-Year-Old Boy
content:
A family is devastated after an 11-year-old boy died from a gunshot wound in Wayne County Thursday.
The deadly incident happened around 4:45 p.m. at a Sevendales Drive residence just off Dollardtown Road in the eastern part of the county. There are reports a chaplain visited with the family Thursday as loved ones grieve the death of the child. The name of the boy has not been released.
The death investigation is being handled by the Wayne County Sheriff’s Office. Authorities so far have not released any official information. A report is expected Friday.
